item.content:encoded:
Contact Sonu Sood For Medical Help and Whatsapp Number Details with Mobile Helpline number and Personal Contact Number with Social Media Accounts on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Website

Sonu Sood Contact Number, Whatsapp Helpline No 2022, COVID 19 Assistance, Official Website, Sood Charity Foundation

Sonu Sood Contact details for financial help, job search help, COVID or other help & Toll-free Helpline, Whatsapp number information can be accessed in this article. Popular actor Sonu Sood and his team is helping people of India in these bad times. Here you will find details of Helpline toll-free numbers & WhatsApp contact numbers shared by the Sonu Sood  & team.

How to Contact Sonu Sood for Help using Charity Foundation Website

Sonu Sood helps the needy people through his Charity Foundation, named Sood Charity Foundation. The foundation does not accept any money or help. This tells a lot about the Character of this Real-life Hero. You may visit the Sood Charity website https://soodcharityfoundation.org/. In this portal, you will get the detailed information regarding various help offerings along with the contact information. For contacting the sood charity foundation by email, you can send it to supportus@soodcharityfoundation.org.

Contact Sonu Sood by directly call phone number

Sonu Sood is trying to help as much as possible people in these bad times. So don’t expect to find Sonu Sood’s personal contact number anywhere online. There are various helpline numbers active and few WhatsApp support lines too. You may contact the Sonu Sood team through his official website and send an email to the official email address.

How to Approach Sonu Sood for Job seeker / Help using Toll-Free Helpline Number

Sonu Sood is active on the different online and offline mediums to help the people in needy. He has initiated a Toll-Free Helpline Number to Contact him for help. Sonu Sood has been launched a helpline number 1800 121 664422  for the job seekers searching for the job during the pandemic.

Sonu Sood Helpline Numbers

Helpline Numbers:  1800 121 664422 or 9321472118. On mobile number, please send SMS or Whatsapp message only.

Pediatric heart surgeries Helpline number: 02067083686.

Contact Sonu Sood for help on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Whatsapp

This article guides you to contact Sonu Sood for Help using the Mobile Helpline Number, Website, Personal Social Media Accounts like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Whatsapp.

Sonu Sood’s Facebook account

Sonu Sood’s Twitter account

Sonu Sood’s Instagram account

Contact Sonu Sood through Whatsapp Number:

Recently in a tweet Sonu sood mentioned a whatsapp number 9321472118. You may send your query via whatsapp chat on this number. This is not personal number of the actor and it has been specifically mentioned to send your queries by message only, please do not call.

Sood Charity Foundation IAS registration/apply for online coaching

Sood Charity Foundation’s SAMBHAVAM is a unique program for aspirants of IAS (Civil Services). It is a quality coaching facility to needy aspirants at top civil services institutes of India. The candidates can apply for the Sonu Sood free IAS Coaching Scholarship by clicking here.

Sood Charity Foundation Free CA Education Internship / Coaching

To become a Chartered Accountant is a milestone to achieve in ones life. Realizing the need to foster inclusive education, Sood Charity Foundation has joined hands with WIRC of ICAI, Media Chutney to launch a one of it’s kind initiative – SAKSHAM. It aims to empower aspiring students by providing support with education and other facets of becoming a Chartered Accountant. To apply for free CA internship, click here.
